titles: A letter and declaration of the nobility and gentry of the county of York. To his excellency, the Lord Generall Monck.
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
notes: The "declaration" bears the names of Tho. Lord Fairfax and others.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1649-1660 --  Sources.
